values: How to Deal with the Guilt of Sexual Failure for the Glory of Christ and His Global CauseHow to Deal with the Guilt of Sexual Failure for the Glory of Christ and His Global Cause

Satan will certainly remind you of your sinful failures. But Christ has defeated both the devil and sin to give you a redeemed passion.Satan will certainly remind you of your sinful failures. But Christ has defeated both the devil and sin to give you a redeemed passion.
